General.Name: Shenzhen Sunnypol Optoelectronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Sunnypol Optoelectronics Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of polarizers in China. It offers polarizers for mobile phones, tablet computers, computer displays, LCD TVs, 3D glasses, anti-glare lenses, filters for photographic equipment, etc., as well as polarized microscopes, special medical glasses, and other special applications. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
